    • Method Detail

      • setUserInput

        public void setUserInput(int mask)
        Controls the available means of user input when user input is disabled.


        Disable all: setUserInput(0);
        Enable keyboard only: setUserInput(Environment.INPUT_KEYBOARD);
        Enable mouse & keyboard: setUserInput(Environment.INPUT_MOUSE | Environment.INPUT_KEYBOARD);

        Parameters:
        mask - flags indicating which types of input to allow

      • saveScreenshot

        public void saveScreenshot(boolean hideUsername)
        Takes and saves a screenshot.
        Parameters:
        hideUsername - true to cover the player's username; otherwise false

      • takeScreenshot

        public java.awt.image.BufferedImage takeScreenshot(boolean hideUsername)
        Takes a screenshot.
        Parameters:
        hideUsername - true to cover the player's username; otherwise false
        Returns:
        The screen capture image.

      • enableRandom

        public boolean enableRandom(java.lang.String name)
        Enables a random event solver.
        Parameters:
        name - the anti-random's (manifest) name (case insensitive)
        Returns:
        true if random was found and set to enabled; otherwise false

      • disableRandom

        public boolean disableRandom(java.lang.String name)
        Disables a random event solver.
        Parameters:
        name - the anti-random's (manifest) name (case insensitive)
        Returns:
        true if random was found and set to disabled; otherwise false

      • enableRandoms

        public void enableRandoms()
        Enables all random event solvers.

      • disbleRandoms

        @Deprecated
public void disbleRandoms()
        Deprecated. Use disableRandoms()
        Disables all randoms.
